name: The Good Boy
description:
NOTE: The main menu screen is not fully functional right now as we ran out of time. Simply click the LMB to start the game and press Esc to quit.

Human has lost an important item. But that's ok. Dog knows how to fetch.

Follow The Good Boy as he searches the house for all the things his human has lost.

Programming: Juliana Vaculíková

3D art: Niko Karvonen

2D art and design: Hanna Tuominen,  Sampo Jumisko,  Venla Kähkönen

Additional assets from Unity Store and Google Poly:

Alexander Brodin, Bill Baran, Chris Ross, Cuong Nguyen, David Rohr, Don Carson, Eli Gasiorowski, Flashy Sprinkles, Jared Bitner, Jarlan Perez, Jiang Liu, Justin Randall, Kristian Poulsen, Matt Bower, Nils Folker, no clu, Poly by Google, Robert Schlyter, Simon W, Vincent Bitner, Wanja Pflüger
